copy.subheading: Follow the progress in the Transaction History section of your wallet.

alert.text: Your SNT deposit will be returned and name will be available to other users.

error.connect: Please connect to Ethereum %{network} to continue.

optimized: This site is optimized for Status. Get the App to enable all features and get the best experience.

name.owned: This registry is not owned by registry

price.label: Registry Price
price.placeholder: (Optional) Registry will be free if left blank

terms.title: Terms of name registration
terms.funds_deposit: Funds are deposited for 1 year. Your SNT will be locked, but not spent.
terms.funds_release: After 1 year, you can release the name and get your deposit back. The name is yours until you release it.
terms.names_creation: Names are created as a subdomain of %{stateofus}. They are property of Status and may be subject to new terms.
terms.contract: If the %{stateofus} contract terms change—e.g. Status makes contract upgrades—you have the right to get your deposit back, even for names held less than 1 year.

rule.title: Names may not:
rule.five: mimic an Ethereum address (start with %{eth_address} and contain only hexadecimal characters in the first 12 digits)

terms.illegal_name: Registering an illegal name via the registry contract will result in the loss of your SNT deposit and removal of the name.
terms.contact: Contact codes and wallet addresses associated with your name are publicly available information.

one.title: Simplify your ETH address
one.subtitle: Your complex wallet address (0x...) becomes an easy to read, remember & share URL:

two.title: 10 SNT to register
two.subtitle: Register once to keep the name forever. After 1 year, you can release the name and get your SNT back.

three.title: Connect & get paid
three.subtitle: Share your name to chat on Status or receive ETH and tokens.

welcome.title: ENS names transform those crazy-long addresses into unique usernames
